comment.author: 59573650@N06
comment._content:
This is where the famous Ballybunion Golf Course sits on the edge of the Atlantic.
Beautiful place and again, a must see.

comment.author: 30369211@N00
comment._content: This is an interesting one. I couldn't figure out where the photographer was set up for this shot: he had to be up somewhere high, and there is no suitable building there. Not any more! He was up on the old Church of Ireland, which is now completely gone! Compare this shot with this streetview.
